name: owi-ai
description: Autonomous trading bot for inflation protection using USDC and tokenized gold

scripts.dev: concurrently -n FRONTEND,BACKEND -c cyan,magenta "pnpm --filter owi-frontend dev" "pnpm --filter owi-backend dev"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter owi-frontend build && pnpm --filter owi-backend build
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter owi-frontend lint && pnpm --filter owi-backend lint
scripts.test: echo "Run 'cd contracts && forge test' for smart contract tests"
scripts.forge:deploy: cd contracts && forge script script/Deploy.s.sol --rpc-url base_sepolia --broadcast --verify

author: oWi Team
